1.content:
Sonic and his friends went out for a good time in the park. Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Cream, Rouge, Silver, and Blaze decided to play with Tails' new hi-tech frisbee, garanteed to get far distance. The Gang had a blast, untill Knuckles threw the Frisbee too hard and it went past a wierd fence that they have seen before.

Sonic: huh, I've Never noticed this before...

Tails: yeah, me niether...

Knuckles: well whether it's been here before or not, We have to climb over it if we want to get the frisbee back...

Rouge: ok, Have fun Knuckles.

Knuckles: What? Why only Me?

Amy: Because you were the one who threw it too hard.

Cream: It's only fair mister Knuckles...

Knuckles: Fine I'll Get it....

Knuckles climbed over the fence to get the frisbee. the others waited 5 minutes when knuckles climbed back over the fance.

Silver: What took you So long Knuckles?

Tails: and where's the Frisbee?

Knuckles: Forget the Frisbee, You Got to See this!!!!

So Sonic and the others climbed over the fence, and discoved a forest pathway that lead to a Strange Factory.

Cream: what is that?

Blaze: could this be another factory of Eggman's?

Sonic: how can it be? We made Sure to Destroy all of his factories when he died when his Egg Carrier Crashed during our last encounter with him?

Amy: Well, Maybe this one had a cloaking device around it or something? after all, none of us remembered that fence at the park before, Right?

Silver: Very True, besides I think I just found out where our Frisbee went.

Silver pointed to a broken window in the factory. Seeing how all the other windows aren't broken it could be where the frisbee is.

Rouge: Good let's Get it and get out of here...This Place Gives me the Creeps.

Sonic: Ok, let's go in, Get the Frisbee and check out this factory just in case this is one of Eggman's old Weapons factories...

So Sonic and the others run towards a factory, Unaware what the Factory Really is. You See this was an old Baby Delivery Factory that was shut down because of an accident. The factory was sealed off with a fence to keep unwanted intruders out.
As Sonic and the other walk inside the factory, the notice tons of Mechanical Hands and Conveyor belts with different stations and what seem like diapers and baby care stuff.

Cream: This doesn't look so mean and scary...

Amy: what's with all the baby stuff?

Tails: Now I Remember! It was in last week's Newspaper, Apperantly this used to be a Baby Delivery Factory...

Blaze: Really? like Storks and bundles of Joy stuff...

Tails: yes.

Knuckles: but i thought Babies were born though....you know...

Tails: Yes, but this was for people who wanted to get a new start on life. It Even had Regression Equipment to change them into Babies...

Amy: So Why was this place shut down?

Tails: apperantly the previous Managers were sent though the delivery process on accident, and after wards the equipment mistaken everyone who worked there as Babies... After the inncident, They shut it down and abandoned it to prevent anymore accidents.

Silver: I guess That Explains the fence that recently appeared in the park.

Rouge: yeah yeah, I just want to find that stupid frisbee and get the heck out of here...I have to open Club Rouge in 3 hours and still i got alot to do before opening...

Sonic: I wish this place had better lights, then we can find it faster.

Amy: Maybe there's a light switch somewhere?

Knuckles: Maybe this Lever Activates the Lights?

Tails: KNUCKLES NO! THAT'S THE ON SWITCH!

But Tails' Warning was too late, Knuckles pushed the lever, and all the lights and Machinery started to Activate. And once the machinery turned on, the Main Computer's voice played through the Loud Speaker.

Main Computer: ACTIVATING MAIN OPERATING SEQUENCE. 8 BABIES FOUND. BEGINING OPERATION.

(What Happens to Our Group of Friends now? You Decide! please choose one of the following options to build what happens in the story)
1.title: Prolouge to the Madness

Machines all around them started up.

Tails: Oh no, we have to get out of here, now!

Just as Tails shouted, metal arms came out of the walls and ceiling grabbing each of them and lifting them in the air.

Knuckles: What is this, I can't break it.

Amy: Look where its taking us.

Amy noticed they were being carried to a series of conveyors.

111.content:
Sonic was put down on a conveyor first as more arms held him in place on it. He moved down abit and came to a stop. Sonic managed to look above him and saw Tails being place behind him in a similar manner. One by one all eight of them were place and held down on the conveyor system. As they made their way down the conveyor Sonic saw what was in store for them, he could make out several stations along the conveyor all designed to do one thing: Make those on it, into babies.

Sonic came to a stop at the first station and looked what it was. Up on the shelf were multiple types and styles of diapers. No matter how hard Sonic wiggled in the restraints the same thing went through his mind, they were all about to be diapered and there wasn't anything they could do to stop it.

The machine reach up on the shelf with its robotic arm and grabbed a diaper. It pulled out....

After Sonic and company had all been adorned in thick, poofy padding, some arms came out, each with different sets of clothes for each. However, each and every set of clothes, looked incredibly girly.

Sonic was put in a pink, frilly dress that went down to his knees, along with a pink bow in his hair. Tails got a pink baby T-shirt that read "Mommy's little girl" along with a baby bonnet. Knuckles got a pink onesie with several cute cartoon characters on it. Amy got a babyish romper with a heart pattern on it. Cream was put in a baby dress that reached her waist, with a floral pattern and a big, pink bow tied around her head. Silver was put in a purple onesie with several tiny, pink bows in his hair. Blaze was put in a purple romper and a purple baby bonnet to match. and finally, Rouge was put in a purple onesie with a gem pattern. 11111121.content:
The conveyor kept on moving, containing the newly created babies that were all reacting differently to the situation they found themselves in.

Sonic was doing his best to resist what was going on, trying to get out of frilly dress that he found himself in, Amy not doing much to help as she just stared and blushed at him. Knuckles was the most visibly angered in the situation, the fact that Rouge seemed to be laughing at his anger didn’f help. Tails was in a panic over his babyish appearance, but Cream tried to help calm him down, telling him that he didn’t look bad. Silver, while embarrassed looked to be fine as he held hands with Blaze, hoping that they would be out of here soon.

As the conveyor continued while the group adjusted to their new looks, the end was in site as a chute was visible to them. Where this went to they had no time to think as one by one they all fell into it, screaming as they fell down for some time.

Eventually, though they all fell into a sort of ball pit, which thankfully didn’t hurt from the long fall. The group all stared in bewilderment, notixing that they now seemed to be in a nursery, one befitting of their new appearence.

Now that they found out where the chute took them, what does the group do...

As the Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Silver feel helpless on the mechanical arms they watched in dismay as the girls and them went their separate ways as they travel deep in the factory.

11211.content:
The machine then lead the boys to what appears to be a bath station. Sonic started to tremble in fear since he is scared of water.

Tails: What are we going to do.

Silver: We need to stick together and find a way out of here.

Knuckles: I need to get out now their is no way I'm gonna be babied on!

He said struggling to be free.

They then entered the bath area and when they entered the door sealed closed behind them.

Sonic felt like he was going to get sick and tried to get himself free.

Tails: Sonic relax it can't be that bad.

Sonic then watch in horror as the arms removed his gloves, shoes, and socks. He then turned to see his friends suffering the same fate as tails tried to fly away but the arms also removed his, gloves, shoes, socks. Silver tried to use his powers to stop the machine and Kuckles tried using his strength to free himself but they were as well stripped of their attire. Their clothes were then put in a garbage chute and possibly went somewhere impossible to find. The machine then released the four into the water where they tried to escape but the machine used even more arms to force them back in as where all bathed like babies.

After a few minutes of bathed torture they were then put out to dry off for a bit.

Phase one complete. Starting phase two in a few minutes.

As the machine left they used the towels to cover themselves.

Tails: We have got to get out of here!

Knuckles: Yeah! No Crap Genius!

Sliver: I got an idea!

Sonic: What is it?

Silver: Knuckles can you use your strength to force open the door.

Knuckles: Well I could try.
11211.title: Bath station

1122.content: As Amy, Cream, Rouge, and Blaze saw as the boys disappear to areas unknown, their covered conveyor brought them to their first stop on becoming babies, and as they neared the station, they could only imagine the humiliation that they were about to endure, and that it will be permanent for them all.
1122.title: Follow the Girls

11221.content:
As the conveyor belt came to a grinding halt, the four girls took the opportunity to continue wriggling their way out of their metal bonds. Rouge and Amy began by delivering several swift kicks to the mechanical hands that pinned them up against the rough surface of the conveyor belt. With each kick, the mechanical hands shook from side to side, still keeping their fingers tightly wrapped around their victims arms and legs. As the fighting continued, Amy and Rouge found themselves becoming more and more tired.

"W-What's going on!?" Amy panted, "I can't break free!"

"They're tougher than I thought!" Rouge growled.

"Has anyone got a plan?" Cream asked, slightly panicking.

"Phase One: Activate" A gentle voice came from the speakers above. "All subjects are ready for processing.

"P-Processing?!" Amy gasped.

"T-This can't be happening!" Blaze yelped, desperately trying to scramble free.

As Amy, Blaze and Rouge continued to fight against their metal bonds, Cream the Rabbit lay perfectly still, she couldn't bear to move or try and break free amidst the madness that unfolded before her. A stream of tears ran down her face while the sound of the machines in the background began to kick into high gear. In the corners of her vision, she noticed another group of mechanical hands invite themselves into the current situation.

"More!?" Rouge frowned, "It looks like they've sent in reinforcements."

For each girl, a fresh pair of mechanical hands slowly moved towards their victims and began to latch onto a random piece of clothing, forcing Amy, Rouge and Blaze to continue their struggle.

Amy was first, the hands began to remove her socks and shoes before eventually tugging at her skirt. The response from Amy was a series of desperate kicks as the mechanical hands started to undo her skirt and discard it, leaving her in just her basic white underwear and a small bra in front of her shocked friends.

Rouge was second, her socks and shoes were the first to go. Her bodysuit was unzipped and discarded to reveal her pink frilly underwear and her bra.

"M-My clothes!" Amy shrieked, her underwear and bra were quickly removed and tossed aside, leaving her naked amongst her friends.

"What kind of pervert invented this machine!?" Rouge felt the embarrasment rush over her, her underwear and bra were idly tossed aside like trash while the mechanical arms tightened their grip on Rouge's arms and legs.

"I don't like this, at all!" Cream began to bawl, her sun dress was quickly ripped apart and her frilly white underwear were pulled down to her knees, leaving her in the same naked state as her friends.

As the four girls realized their predicament, Amy and Rouge exchanged looks of sheer horror and embarassment as their signature clothes were torn away from them.

"Has ANYONE got a plan?" Amy blushed, awkwardly glancing at Rouge and Blaze's naked bodies.

"G-Give me a second, Amy." Blaze shyly spoke up, wrestling the mechanical arms for her dignity, "I'll melt the metal hands with my pyrokinesis."

"Phase One: Complete." The voice from the speakers continued, "Proceeding to Phase Two: Diapering"

"Diapering?" Cream squeaked, "I'm too old to wear diapers!"

"You've got to do something now!" Rouge exclaimed, looking at Blaze.

"I'm trying!" Blaze replied.

As the group continued to squirm and panic, a cluster of mechanical hands appeared, all of which were holding different items in their hands. A pair of hands held four different diapers, each of which were a bright white color with babyish prints on the front. The diapers were spread open and were placed underneath all of their recipients, much to their dismay.

"W-What!?" Amy yelped, "I'm not a baby!"

It was too late, the mechanical hands began to unfold the large diaper in front of Amy, forcing her to swallow a large lump in her throat. The diaper was quickly wrapped around her waist, despite her loud complaints, the hands continued to stretch the tapes over to the front of Amy's diaper and provide a snug fit. Rouge and Blaze found themselves unable to resist, they soon found themselves at the mercy of the mechanical hands and each had a diaper taped around their waist.

Cream was given a different experience. The mechanical hands gently lifted the rabbit up into the air, causing her to whimper in fear, she was treated by a cautious and slow pair of hands that gently wrapped the diaper around her waist and slowly stretched the tapes across to the front. A third hand appeared from behind to rest on her bottom to place her back onto the floor. A white pacifier was slowly placed into Cream's mouth, followed by a gentle pat on the head.

As the final diaper was wrapped round Blaze's waist, a series of sparks began to envelope the mechanical arms that pinned her body down. The sparks began to develop into a series of small fires that quickly overwhelmed the hands. As the fire began to consume Blaze's bonds, the shiny metal began to turn hot red.

"I-It's working!" Blaze smirked, she took the opportunity to give the metal hands another series of kicks.

"Alright!" Amy cheered, still attempting to break free.

"You'll have to work a little faster! I don't want to be stuck in this position longer than I should be." Rouge continued to wrestle with her bonds. "I like rough fights, but this isn't what I had in mind."

To everyone's surprise, and shock, the mechanical hand...
11221.title: Diapering Station

choices: "I have a history with wearing diapers and I like them..."
"I feel really uncomfortable without my clothes..."
112212.content:
A sense of accomplishment and relief swarmed over Blaze. It was at that point that the mechanical hands that pinned Blaze up against the conveyor belt started to feel the raw heat, they slowly started to malfucion and eventually disintegrate into nothing. Amy, Rouge and Cream cheered, finding a new sense of energy to continue wrestling with the hands that pinned them down.

"It worked!" Amy cheered, deciding to kick the mechanical hands again. "Do it again, Blaze! Get us out of here!"

It took Blaze a moment to regain her composure, slowly rising off the ground and on her feet, the thick diaper between her legs proved to be a nuisance in more ways than one. The thick absorbant padding between her legs forced her to spread out and disorient her balance. Instead of instantly ripping the diaper off, she needed something to cover her previously exposed nether regions.

The mechanical hands were slowly melted and destroyed, one by one with little effort on Blaze's part. Rouge, Amy and Cream took the opportunity to break free and escape from their bonds.

"That was incredible, Blaze!" Amy stood up, feeling somewhat uneasy, she slowly waddled over to her feline friend and smiled. "For a moment there I thought the arms weren't going to melt."

"We'd be in a lot of trouble without your pyrokinesis." Cream added, pulling the pacifier out of her mouth with an audible pop.

"It's nothing, really." Blaze replied with a soft smile, "It was a little hard concentrating at first, but I managed to melt them with ease." her focus on Amy's face began to drift, Blaze slowly shifted her eyes at her friend's diaper, forcing her to shyly look away in embarrassment. "I-In any case, whatever they're made out of... They're pretty tough."

"Oh, they're tough?" Rouge responded sarcastically. "They're so tough, they put Eggman's biggest robots to shame."

Amy nodded with Rouge's comparison, awkwardly shifting her eyes away from Rouge's naked body. "I think should find the exit before something else happens."

"You're right, Amy. I'll go and look for an exit," Blaze announced, suddenly waddling away from Rouge and Amy, she started scanning the rest of the conveyor belt for a possible exit. "I'll keep an eye out for a hatch or a ladder. It shouldn't be too hard to find a way out."

"Wait a minute," Amy quickly waddled over to her feline friend, "We can't split up!"

"Yeah," Rouge nodded in agreement, "Why're you in such a hurry to go alone? Let's focus on working together."

A sense of awkwardness soon swept over Blaze as Amy and Rouge glanced at her. The feline of the group felt a lump develop in her throat, she ultimately gave in and sighed. Her heart began to race as she opened her mouth and began to speak,
112212.title: ...Melted, allowing them to escape.

They go find a way out first

113111111211122.title: Two Hedgehogs and a Stork

1131111112111222.content: The Stork held the basket handles in her mouth, but was still able to talk to the Hedgehogs, "You may not remember me, but I definitely remember the two of you. Of all the babies I've hatched in my nest, you two were the first ones to start kissing after being a day-old." Sighed the Stork happily as she landed. "Who are you?" Asked Sonic as the Stork undid the blanket restraining the two of them. "I'm Rhea, your Stork. I was the one that laid your eggs, hatched you, cared for you as best a mama could, and *Sniff* the one that delivered you to your parents when it was decreed to be done." Amy Rose clambered out of the basket as she looked at Rhea, "But I thought that Storks were just a myth to serve as a replacement for Sexual Activity when the question is asked by little kids." Amy and Sonic were both picked up by Rheas wings as she held them both, "We're told as a myth, but before sexual ends were more commonplace in the world, it was us Storks that brought new life to it for those unable to bear children or unable to do that kind of thing together, we laid the eggs, the eggs hatched into the young, and we delivered our young to the dirt world below." Tenderly spoke Rhea as she walked over to a nest and sat down in it. "Back then it was common for Storks like me to raise our non-Stork kids as family. And we were happy, raising our young and giving them our other young as their own. One stork raised a pair of twins, but only one was slated to be born, the other twin became the first ones daughter many years later without knowing it. Their Stork was heart-broken, but happy that the twins were still together in the end." Amy began to wonder how that sounded familiar to her as she saw Sonic snuggled up against the warm feathers of Rheas' body, smiling. "It seems that Sonic remembers me in his dreams still." Said the Stork as she shifted herself and placed Sonic right underneath her as she carefully knelt back down again, hiding the diapered blue hedgehog from view before holding Amy with both hands next and looked down at her happily. "So... you are my real mama?" Asked Amy as she looked up at the avian in wonder "I am, I also was the mother of your father and his mother and triplet sister-in-laws, those four back in the 40s were so rambunctious that I can still remember how they would always confuse me all the time by swapping their pacifiers around and wearing each-others clothes and pajamas, even though their families wouldn't have them for 6 more years, being their real mother was fine enough for me." Amy was soon being cradled in Rheas winged arms, slowly drifting off to sleep. "I'd always remember how I never liked the deliveries, tearing what I had made away from me and giving it to either someone else I raised before or to a complete stranger altogether. You two were my last babies before the Anti-Stork Policy of 1975 stopped us from delivering to nations other than America, the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union. Then 1991 came when Storks were forbidden from even making children, preferring the more time-consuming and painful methods, along with the forced final delivery where we were forced to deliver all of our remaining babies before we were sent into the universe." By this point, Amy had fallen asleep already, "I was the one-percent left behind on Earth that chose to observe the downfall of life, all alone, without any of my young to watch over. And then I saw you two together, giving me joy to see my daughter and son together once more. Being happy to see you together brought love to my heart again. And now that You've been sent right to me again, I will never let you go away and I'll always love you both dearly, for who else would have more love for someone than their own creator?" Rhea sat up again to look down at a smiling Sonic as she placed Amy Rose next to him and placed a blanket over them as they snuggled together, causing the Stork to blush happily as she smiled and sat back down again with her babies finally home again. "Sweet dreams Amy and Sonic, Mommy loves you both forever." And with that Rhea fell asleep too, the happiest she has felt in many decades.

11311111121112222.content: A storm bristled and blew all around Sonic as he was slightly jostled and thrown about the confines of his and Amy's Basket, their tiny forms struggling as the sounds of rain pelted the side of their carrier, peeking through an irregularity in the baskets top, he saw the struggling form of his mother Rhea as she flew the two of them through the heart of the storm itself, few times being blown backwards slightly by an errant gust of wind only for her to struggle against its battering. the sound of Rhea's wings were soon joined by several others accompanying her, creating a vast chorus of feathers in its wake. "Rhea!" Called one of the other Storks as she floated closer to Sonics' mommy, "Uraine just reported hearing the engines of an E-2 Hawkeye just several kilometers east-by-southeast from our position. We've been found out!" "Damn... Selene, take a flock away from here; we'll try to maneuver the World Governments away from you while you make your escape." Commanded Rhea as she slowed back behind Selene and towards the rear of the flock, "Listen everyone, the World Governments have found us out, we need to lead them away from the main body of the Flock. Yuoer, Halrey, Quion, organize your flights together. Dorema, Lamrack, go to Selene, and take Gilgamesh and his flight with you." "Are you nuts Mom?" Asked an ethreal-shaped bird as it blew in like dust near Rhea's left Catching the sight of Sonic as he gazed upon the bronzed eyes of his oldest brother, in his bill was a basket decorated with a heavenly sun and a regal moon formed in the shape of a yin-and-yang, a befitting symbol for children born to a bird belonging to both the light and the shadow, "I'm going with you, you cannot hope to stop them by yourself mom." "This is not up for debate, Gilgamesh." Pleaded Rhea as an ethreal hand reached out from beneath her beating wings and then looked down upon his basket as it reached in and grabbed hold of a small bundle. From within the dark of the basket, Amy got a quick look at what appeared to be something blue gaze back at her with curious, innocent azure eyes for a brief second before the basket itself was locked up by Gilgamesh as he used the same magic to lower the exposed bundle into Rheas' basket before sealing it. "I wanted my sister to see the Mythical World I was about to seed for her to play in with my children." Lamented Gilgamesh sadly, only to feel his mother gently drape her 'hand' across his back and give him a small smile in turn. "Maybe if we all make it through this vortex she shall see it with her own eyes of teal, my son." "Luck be with you mom." Bidded Gilgamesh as he flew on ahead with his flight of Storks, "See you when you get to Alogo." Than everything faded to black...
11311111121112222.title: Sonic's Dream

113111111211122222.content:
Sonic began to toss and turn in his sleep as deeply-seeded memories of his past sprung up, how the World Government captured his mommy and half of the flock, several of them he remembered being Uraine, Selene, Lamrack, and Quion. Among those imprisoned, the so-called "Life Heretic" Gilgamesh had escaped, taking with him the remainder of their flock along with all of Quions' children through the World Vortex. He then remembered the pain of near-permanate separation as officers from the World Government separated him, Amy and the other sister from Rhea to be sent to their future (imperfectly selected by Stork Standards) homes, or to orphanages and asylums when the bureaucratic process became too winded. The last thing he remembered dreaming about was seeing the crying tears of Amy and... Sonic remembered who it was, who was their other sister that was in Gilgamesh's basket. He remembered who she was.

Sonic awoke with a shock as he jolted up from the nest, screaming out his sisters' name with desperation as he reached out into nothing futilely. "ROUGE!" Sonic panted to himself as he looked over and noticed Amy stirring in her sleep, slightly before weakly opening her eyes and rubbing them; she was now smaller than last time he saw her, appearing the same size as a real baby. Looking down at himself, he realized that he too was a baby as well. "Sownic, whats' wrong?" muttered Amy as she yawned slightly, "I don't know exactly what time it is, but I think we should be asleep unless Mommy wakes us up." "Sorry Ames, I just dreamed a flashback to our failed Exodus and how we all got separated." spoke Sonic softly to her as he crawled over to lay down next to her. "It was stormy, d'you remember it?"
113111111211122222.title: Sonic wakes up, physically shrunken to a baby

I remembered me and Rouge were being taken to be delivered to a home of sorts. Only we were sent to an orphanage, I don't know what became of Rouge after that." 11311111121112222212.content: A distant alarm echoed through the empty corridors of the factory. Even though it was seemingly distant, the words spoken over the automated system rang clearly in Rhea's ears <ALTLERT! ALTLERT! Aberrant-Carrier Detected.> Without warning, Rhea tossed Baby Sonic and Amy Rose into the air before reaching down into the nearby basket and pulled out the bundles as the two baby hedgehogs fell into them before the bundles were knotted and placed into the basket as she picked it up in her bill and was airborne immediately. "Mommy, what is it?" asked Amy as she peered through the woven basket to Rhea as she flew. "Immediately after our failed exodus, the World Governments felt it absolutely necessary to control birth rates through themselves and not our kind, and to ensure that such an event as a Stork Birth was averted: robotic sentries were built into the factory itself as it was repurposed from Naturally Born Deliveries to Age Regressed Deliveries in an event to control our overall influence in society; viewing us as Overlords instead of Mothers and Fathers which a number of those captured truly were, they still feared the possibility of an External Stork Insurrection from what they believed in our exodus." Rhea swooped into a narrow hallway as she flew over a patrol made up of robotic canines prowling along the ground.

All units in vicinity, be on priority 4 detection.> "Selene? How did you get a Baby? We're all under strict reproduction observations here." Questioned Rhea to herself. "It must be one of our friends!" Stated Amy as she glanced up at Rhea, We've got separated inside of this place and babied." Amy then glanced down at her body and began to hug herself all over, "Though I don't mind these results one bit, mommy." "Who are your friends' names?" Asked Rhea. "Those that were with us were, Knuckles, Cream, our sister Rouge, Miles 'Tails' Prower-" "Rouge is here?! HOLD ON ROUGE!! MOMMY'S COMING FOR YOU!!!" Rhea rocketed off towards the Canines as she brought her legs forward and spread her toes apart and latched onto one of the canine drones and lifted it up into the air before tossing it against the adjacent wall, smashing it to pieces before turning towards the remaining two drones, only to look on in sheer horror as they leap up and latch onto the basket and proceed to tear into it. Rhea knocked one of the Drones off and saw it crash against the floor below, only to see the remaining drone fall free from the basket and land on all fours before looking up at Rhea with emotionless LED Sensors and the diapered rear of a baby hedgehog struggling against the grip of its mouth trying to get out. With a tilt of its head backwards and a release of its grip, the baby hedgehog was gulped down the drones transparent gullet, the struggling form reaching its destination in the Drones internal chest cavity. <Newborn liberated from Aberrant-Carrier known as Rhea, Newborn to be delivered to Delivery facility to await Government-Approved Delivery Location, Requisitioning replacement Drone Squad to recover remaining Newborn in Grid coordinates 1-9-3-8-Beta-1.> With nothing else to do, the Drone knelt down and leapt off, the Baby hedgehog futilely pounding against the fluidic membrane as tears began to well up in Rhea's eyes as she began to scream and cry out the name of her kidnapped baby in sorrow.

To his surprise, Tails found himself lying beneath his real mother.

"Mom?" He asked.

"Hello, Miles." Rosemary smiled, picking him up and snuggling.

"What's going on? What happened to me?"

"It's an amazing coincidence, darling. I applied for a service to adopt you a younger sibling. I was heartbroken that I missed your young years and I wanted the experience of being a mother... Then, to my surprise, you turned out to be my new baby. How did this happen to you, darling?"

"Mom, it was horrible. We lost the frisbee and it went over into this factory and we tried to get it back and these machines grabbed us and turned us into babies."

"Oh my, that's quite the tale..."

114211221221212212111.content: When Tails awoke, he found himself inside of a cloth bundle as it slowly bobbed back-and-forth, almost as though it were moving around. With his hand, Tails reached out and peeked out of the folds to see what was going on. "Good morning, son." Tails saw that he was being carried by the stork -whom he found out yesterday to be his real mom- as she flew through a large empty expanse of the factory, devoid of machinery and equipment, instead the corridor was filled with clinic dividers, hospital beds, desks, cabinets, chairs and what appeared to be multi-sectioned hatches imbedded in the floor below and ceiling above them. "Mama, where are we anyway?' asked Tails curiously as he looked around the expansive room as they traversed it, "This doesn't look like the factory." "You're correct, son. This is actually the original floor of the facility below where you came from." Said the stork, "I still remember when this room was not ugly and filled with bureaucracy wherever you flew. Those were the good old days; back when I still had you, and we still had our childen by right." "By right?" "It was during a time when a Stork could legally own their own children and keep them for themselves alone, instead of being forced to surrender them over to the Emptiness Outside, just as your older sister Rosemary was before." Tails couldn't believe this, not only was his stork his real mom, but his mother that he was delivered to happened to be his older sister as well, "Though, it was good to see her again 8 years ago, despite her age... I so wanted to go and bring her back home instead of being forced to abandoning you. To have my nest full instead of watching my precious babies fend for themselves in the Emptiness Outside." Tails saw a single tear drop from his moms' eye as it fell on his nose, "Damn them... damn them..." Tails watched as he saw his mother cry quietly as she flew towards a hatch that began to open up as sunlight began to pour inside the facility. Tails did not know what was happening as he saw the stork slowly ascend to the hatch above and began to increase her speed as she flew through it. "Mama, what's going on?"
114211221221212212111.title: The Next Day...

1142112212212122121112.content:
"This nonsensical law has gone on for long enough! I am tired of all this Emptiness Laws, and I will not allow these Wild Ones to steal from my kind ever again!" Selene (the Stork) ascended through an exposed hatch as a slight beeping was heard from inside the corridor as Tails peeked around to see what looked like a trio of robotic drones appear from niches in the walls and proceeded to climb the walls of the tunnel towards them. <ALTLERT! ALTLERT! Aberrant-Carrier Detected. Activating Non-Lethal Tranquilizer Rounds and Capture Snares! Engaging Target Now!> "Mama, look out!" Screamed Tails as he clung tightly to his bundle and shivered in fear.
Selene however, began to pick up speed slowly as she ascended the catacombs towards the exit, "What is those things?" "The Governments of the Emptiness Outside sought it in their best interests that any of our kind taking a child with us without proper clearance and paperwork is grounds for individualized treasonous action." replied Selene calmly as she ducked down a minor service conduit as two of the drones shifted to pursue while the third one couldn't shift in time and crashed into the corridors' wall. "Than where are you going, the drones are gonna get us!" "The drones were programmed to contain and retrieve babies should they be part of a 'contraband delivery' as the GEOs called it. Since I've been keeping tabs in you son, I was prepared for this outcome and I never leave without a backup plan in mind."
Selene flew down the corridor and entered what looked like a maintenance management room, Reaching around her neck, Tails saw his mother remove a small smooth stone-like medallion and place it against a niche in the door causing the edges to solidify into a wall before placing the stone key back around her neck and picking up Tails again. "I'm so sorry for giving you that scare baby." Cooed Selene as she gently held the small infant fox to her chest as he began to calm down as he listened to her heartbeat. "Mama, why are we in here?" Asked Tails as he was placed on a nearby changing table as Selene proceeded to remove his soiled disposable and replace it with a cloth diaper, piercing the layers with a soft mulberry safety pin and tucking the triangle inside before picking him back up again. "This is a workshop, before the GEOs stepped in and began automating things, it was our children that helped to maintain most of the equipment and ensure things were running smoothly in our home. I brought us here because I plan to have you infiltrate one of the drones and gain access to it. Your friends are in another part of the facility from what little I could gather from the Drones before their memory cores automatically wipe themselves. I don't know what is going on, but I know that I do not like it one bit."
"I think it's just a sheer coincidence though, me and my friends were playing in the park when we came inside and activated the factory." Spoke Tails, only for Selene to bend down and pick her baby up and look him in the eyes lovingly. "I'm sorry baby, but you're wrong there. Immediately after the fiasco with the GEOs representatives a few weeks ago, another organization stepped in the following day and took command of the facility and all of its equipment, under the pretense of renovating. During and before these turbulent times, a number of us Storks felt that our children were being mistreated by the guidelines of the GEOs law system and decided to sever all ties and seek a paradise for ourselves outside of the GEOs grasp, we were about to announce our independence from their authority when we uncovered the intentions of our new benefactors."
Selene walked over towards what looked like a covered container of some sort and removed the blanket covering it...
1142112212212122121112.title: "I Have to Make Things Right."

11421122122121221211122.content: "This machine, based on what I could gather from the components, is designed to stimulate the synapses of an individuals brain cells and impart it with pre-programmed information, near-instantaneously." Spoke Selene as she set Tails down into a suspended basket next to the device as she continued her lecture, answering Tails silent question to where his own high intelligence came from. "In other words, its basically a virtual reality/mental stimulate?" "Exactly son." Answered Selene as she lightly combed Tails hair with her bill, "But I have no idea what kind of programming nature it possesses, so I need your expertise to figure it out for me. It runs on the same software interface that the Drones have been modified to operate with." Tails then saw as the basket he was inside was lifted up and brought to another door. "What do you want me to do mommy?" Asked Tails quietly with pleading eyes turned to Selene as she removed the stone key once more and placed it against a niche as the door de-solidified itself. "I ask for you to get one of the drones and take control of it from inside and pilot it back here so we could figure out the MIDs nature. It's dangerous, and I honestly would never ask this of you. But, a mother must put her feelings for the moment aside for the sake of moments for the future." Tails saw Selene on the verge of tears as he turned around and whipped his tails to wipe the tears from her eyes and hold his arms up and smile at her, Selene then smiled sadly and warmly embraced her son once again and lightly pecked him on the cheeks, "J-just promise me you'll come back safe, I just got you back again after 8 years apart." Tails wrapped his arms gingerly around Selenes' neck and lightly began to kiss her back, "I can wait until later for the mission, is there a bath around here mommy?" Selene smiled gently as she bundled up Tails and placed him inside of the basket, before leaving the workshop, the stork reached for a small backpack filled with tools and slung it over her left shoulder before picking up the basket in her bill and locking the workshops' door behind them and proceeding to the washroom area.

1321.content:
Sonic slowly opened his eyes, his head still hurting because of the mist that knocked him out. His eyes were still trying to regain their vision, so he couldn't see where he was. He scratched his head and slowly mumbled to himself.

Sonic: Ow....W-What happened? Last thing I remembered was...was...?

Sonic's vision started to come back to him, that's when he realized something wasn't right. He realized he was completely naked and floating in what felt like water or slime. He slowly moved his limbs around but he was limited. He was in what felt like some sort of bubble. But that wasn't the weirdest part. Attached to Sonic's belly was some sort of pulsating cord. Sonic grabbed the cord to get a better look at it. But the moment he did, he felt his body gasping for air, as if he needed the cord to stay alive. Sonic quickly let go of the cord. Other than these changes, he looked the same as he always did, even had his same age.

Sonic: What's going on? Where am I?

Sonic looked around in his surroundings, even with his eye sight back he still had trouble seeing what was outside his bubble. However, he did see Something familiar. Another bubble with a cord coming out of it just his, but the shape of who was inside it was instantly familiar to him. It was Tails, sound asleep too by the looks of it. Sonic looked around some more and saw all his friends in these bubbles too. Amy, Knuckles, Cream, Rouge, Silver, Blaze, they were all here with him. They were each naked inside their own bubbles, with cords coming out from them. All eight of the cords seem to lead to the ceiling above them. However, it was too dark to see where it led. Sonic tried to get the attention of his friends.

Sonic: Guys, Hey Guys! Wake up! Can you hear me?

Sonic's voice was semi muffled given the bubble he was in, however his voice was still loud enough for his friends to hear. They slowly began to move around and wake up.

Tails: S-Sonic? Where are we?

Cream: Why is it so wet?

Amy: and Why are there these cord things?

Amy tried to reach for her cord but Sonic quickly stopped her.

Sonic: Amy don't! If you grab that, you won't be able to breath.

Blaze crossed her arms.

Blaze: Cords to breath? Where exactly are we anyway?

Silver: How did we get here anyway?

Sonic: I don't know...

As Sonic and his friends were talking, their cords were suddenly beginning to move around outside of their bubbles. Some sort of fluid was being pumped through their cords and into their bodies. They were completely unaware of this happening to them as they continued their conversation.

Tails: I think I know where we are. We're what seems to be a Womb and these cords are umbilical cords.

Cream: A Womb? Like where babies come from?

Knuckles: But it's impossible to go back into the womb right? So how did we get here?

The fluid that was entering their bodies was beginning to take affect. It was beginning to warp their minds and slowly erase memories from their past lives without them even noticing it.

Rouge: Knuckles you dummy, We're in here because we've always been here.

Knuckles: Have we?

Blaze: It would make sense...how else would we be in here unless we weren't born yet?

Sonic: I guess you're right.

Sonic and the others's moods began to change because of the fluid being pumped through them. Their moods were changing from worried and confused to calm and happy.

Amy: I actually like it here. It's so warm and comfy.

Amy began to giggle and play with her toes inside of her womb bubble. Cream soon joined her in doing the same.

Cream: Me too!

Tails: Still...I wonder when we will be born?

Rouge: That's for Mommy to decide.

Silver: Mommy?

Blaze: Yes Silver. We're inside her belly after all.

Silver: Oh Right! Hopefully not too long. I'd love to be born and loved.

Sonic: Don't worry Silver, I'm sure Mommy will bring us into the world soon. She loves us after all.

Sonic and the others were completely under the mercy of the womb. In reality they weren't inside a real womb at all. They were still inside the baby factory. The "Womb o' Sphere" as it was called, was a reprogramming area that erased the memories of anyone hooked up inside it, while implanting new memories and even changing likes and behaviors of them as well. The Machine was turning them into it's own little babies. They were totally unaware of anything that was happening to them. All they cared about was being born and being welcomed in their "Mommy's" Arms.

Amy was puzzled, she tried so hard think but nothing was working.

Amy:....I don't know...I don't think I have a name yet. What's your name again?

Sonic shrugged. He had no idea what his name either. In fact, No one knew each other's names, they were completely gone by this point. The fluid had warped their minds to the point of no return, The Machine's job was almost done. Suddenly, something weird was happening to Blaze.

Blaze: Hey Guys...I feel...Funny...

Silver: What's wrong...um...Purple Kitty?

Silver couldn't remember Blaze's own name much less his own.

Blaze: I don't know....I can't feel anything...but...it feels...So nice...Go...Nini...

Blaze closed her eyes. She giggled as she stretched a bit in her tiny womb space and then let out a happy sigh. When she opened her eyes again, they had a blank lifeless stare to them. Her pupils were completely blank, and her only expression was a small smile. She couldn't move anymore nor did she knew how to, that's because her mind was now completely blank...there was nothing left. She was still very much alive, but her mind was completely wiped. Blaze's body was like a hollow shell, ready to be reprogrammed by the computer. Everyone just stared at her like it was nothing, as if they knew it was supposed to happen. Suddenly Rouge began to giggle just like Blaze just did. She was feeling the same feeling Blaze just did.

Rouge: Guess it's my turn to go Nini...Ni...Ni...

Rouge closed her eyes, stretched and let out a happy sigh just like Blaze did. Within an instant she was now in the same blank state, Only a small blank happy smile was on her face. Tails and Cream were both getting the feeling at the same time.

Cream: Is it our turn to go Nini?

Tails: I guess it is.

Cream giggled.

Cream: Ok then...Nini...

Tails and Cream both giggled, as they did the same stretch and happy sigh. They were now blank slates ready to be reprogrammed. Amy was now getting the same feeling. Amy giggled happily.

Amy: I Go Nini Now...

Amy stretched and Sighed as she too turned into the same hollow state. Soon after, Sonic, Silver and Knuckles soon followed. Saying not a word to each other but did the same routine the others did. Sonic and his friends were now blank, empty-minded puppets now under the mercy of the Factory. What happens to them now? Only time will tell...
132122.title: More Memory Erasing

1321221.content: With Sonic, Tails, Amy, Cream, Silver, Blaze, Knuckles, and Rouge all now blank slates, the Womb o' Sphere was ready to work, it had it's own plans for each of the "Babies" within it's programming. Their Transformations were ready to begin, but what happens first?
1321221.title: The Reprogramming Begins

13212211.content: What Physical changes was the Machine ready to do inside the womb?
13212211.title: Physical Changes

132122111.content: Will their genders be swapped or will they all become the same gender?
132122111.title: Change their Genders

1321221112.content: What will they all become?
1321221112.title: All the Same Gender

132122112.content: Do they become older or younger?
132122112.title: Change their Ages

13212212.content:
The Womb O' Sphere was all ready to go with the "Babies" new programming. Now with Sonic and the others becoming blank slates, the machines began to send the fluid through each of their umbilical cords again, This time giving them brand new personalities. The umbilical cords pumped the fluid into each of their bodies and were now beginning to warp each of their blank minds. They started to remember their old names again, but everything else was being seriously changed.

Sonic was being reprogrammed to be more girly and have more interest in girly things like dresses and dollies.

Blaze was being reprogrammed to act more like a tomboy, wanting to wear boyish clothes and a disdain for girly things.

Amy was being reprogrammed to be more mischievous. Being curious, Wanting to explore and getting into trouble, without even realizing it.

Tails and Cream were changing the most, as both of them were being reprogrammed to be like twins. Thinking alike, wanting to wear matching clothes, and giving them a twin mind link with each other. The fluid even changed their ages to be the exact same by shrinking Tails down to 6 years old.

Rouge was being reprogrammed to act like the youngest and most babyish of all. This was ironic due to her being the oldest of the group.

Silver was being reprogrammed to be more like a spoiled brat, wanting to throw tantrums whenever he doesn't get his way.

Knuckles was being reprogrammed to be a crybaby, always crying over the tiniest little thing and to be more whiny.

While their new personalities were being implemented, the fluid was also making physical changes to their bodies. They all started to get a little chubbier, not too much but enough to count as baby fat. Sonic, Amy, Blaze, Silver, Knuckles and Rouge were becoming shorter while still keeping their adult bodies, only being slightly taller than Tails and Cream now. Lastly, Tails and Cream's womb spheres began to join together, just like real twins in the womb. Cream was also beginning to grow a small fox tail similar to Tails's Tails and Tails's gain some cream color fur around his eyes and on his bangs and ears, just like the orange patterns Cream had on her head.

The Mobians' blank stares from the memory erasing were finally becoming more alive and expressive with personality again as the fluid finished the changes. Within Minutes their new personalities were finally complete. They slowly started to display some of their new traits as they were fast asleep in the womb. Sonic was giggling like a little girl, Amy was active and moving around, Blaze was mostly still but moved every now and then, Silver was moving and whining a lot, Tails and Cream were holding hands in their now combined womb, Rouge was sucking her thumb, and Knuckles was whining and whimpering.

Sonic and his friends were now completely different from who they were before. the only thing remembered from their past was only their names, nothing more. With their changes complete, all they can do is sleep and wait till it was time to be reborn.
13212212.title: Mental Changes

choices: Their Regression goes out of control (Bad Ending)
13213.content:
An Hour had passed, the Womb o' Sphere was almost finished with it's work on Sonic and his friends. The fluid being pumped into their bodies warped their minds, erasing memories of their past. Their first meetings, their adventure together, their family, their education, and even memories of being born in the first place were completely gone from their minds forever. Along with that, they were given more babyish behaviors. The Factory was completely warping their minds forever, but our heroes didn't care. They were in total bliss, happy with their current situation and eager to begin their new lives. All because the Machine told them to be. As the last of the mind altering fluid entered their systems, The Womb o' Sphere's computer was processing the next phase of it's procedure. It was readying a new fluid to be pumped into the Mobians, a fluid that will this time alter their bodies. The second the mind altering fluid finished pumping, the new fluid immediately started to flow. Out from the tubes of the main computer, through the cords of the mobians, and soon into their bodies. Meanwhile inside the Womb o' Sphere Sonic and his friends were floating in their womb spheres, happily unaware of what's being done to them. As they floated peacefully, the new fluid was being pumped into their bodies. This time however, due to how thick this new fluid was, they noticed it being pumped into their systems.

Tails: OOF! What was that?

Tails could easily feel the fluid enter his body, and he wasn't alone. The others were feeling the fluid entering their bodies too.

Amy: Something's moving through our cords....and it feels...nice.

Silver: I like it, it feels so warm...

The Mobians were feeling relaxed as the fluid moved through their bodies, but it wasn't long until they started to notice some changes. Rouge was the first to notice, as she was starting to feel a tingly sensation in her body. She fidgeted around, trying to figure out what was wrong. She then looked at her hand and noticed something was happening.Her hand was getting smaller Not just her hand, but her entire body was shrinking. Noticing this, Rouge's confusion turned into wonder and excitement.

Rouge: OOOOOOOOH!

Blaze: What is it Rouge?

Rouge eagerly showed her hands to the others.

Rouge: Lookie! I'm going shrinkies!!!

They all stared at Rouge, noticing that she really was shrinking. They all gasped in amazement.

Cream: Rouge is going shrinkies!!!

Knuckles: No Fair! I wanna go shrinkies too!

Blaze: Me too Me too!!!

The others would soon get their wish, As they all started to get that tingly feeling too. Their bodies were beginning to shrink too just like Rouge.

Sonic: Look! We're all going shrinkies!

Amy: Yay!!! We're going shrinkies!

The Mobians were all feeling excited about their shrinking situation, and why wouldn't they? The computer told them to feel this way, Happiness is the only feeling they can feel during this process. They all continued to get smaller and smaller. At first the fluid was just changing their sizes, but then some noticeable changes began to happen to them. For starters, Tails and Amy's bangs started to get shorter and shorter until they were just tiny tuffs of hair. Blaze's hair was shrinking to tiny stubs and the back of Rouge's hair was completely gone. Silver's hair began to shrink too until it was super tiny. Then his quills started to shrink too, As well as Sonic's. Knuckles's claws were shrinking until they were just tiny stubs and his dreads were becoming shorter too. Rouge's wings began to shrink into itty bitty wings could barely lift her if she tried to fly. Tails's tails were getting smaller and Cream's bunny tail was turning into nothing but a little stub. Lastly, Amy, Blaze and Rouge's boobs were shrinking until they were completely flat chested, and for all of them, their bodies were becoming stubbier and chubbier. It was clear that the fluid wasn't just shrinking their bodies, it was regressing them. Changing them into tiny little babies.

About half an hour passed and the mobians were almost at the end of their regression. Their ages were all caught up with each other and were all now the same exact age. They just entered the age of one and they continued to shrink from there. 11 months, 10 months, 9 months, They were getting as young as they could get. Their bodies continued regressing further. 3 months, 2 months, 1 month, 2 weeks, 1 week, and their bodies stopped shrinking as they all reached one day old. They were all officially newborn infants now. Giggles and coos could be heard through out the Womb o' Sphere's interior. They were happy with their new bodies, and thanks to the mind fluid from before, they can still talk like they could before but not as well though...

Sonic: Me feel great!

Tails: Me too!!

Cream: We're so small, Mommy will surely love us.

Rouge: Mommy wanted us this way, We went shrinkies just for mommy.

They all began to speak in unison.

All: All for Mommy, We love mommy.

Thanks to the Mind altering fluid and the Regression fluid, Sonic, Tails, Amy, Cream, Silver, Blaze, Knuckles, and Rouge were all devoted happy little infants. Ready to be reborn and loved by a loving family.

However did the regression really stop? Was everything all finished or was something about to go wrong?
13213.title: Welcome to Infancy

132132.content:
While our now babified Mobians were happy inside the Womb o' Sphere, things were catastrophic on the outside. The computer that was controlling and monitoring the Womb o' Sphere were was experiencing a Serious problem. Normally the regression fluid would stop flowing at this point in the process. However, the computer was suffering a major glitch. This glitch prevented the computer from stopping the regression fluid that was pumping through the Mobian's bodies. With no way to stop it, Sonic and the others were doomed to regress until they disappear from existence. As the regression fluid continued to flow into the womb o' sphere, Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Cream, Silver, Blaze, and Rouge all continued to float peacefully in their Spheres. Little did they know that their time was almost up...In fact, the Mobians were about to feel the effects right now.

Amy: Hey, Why are we still goin' shrinkies?

Amy looked at her hand as it continued to grow smaller and becoming underdeveloped. The others were noticing the changes too, as they continued to shrink and shrink by the minute. Although while they were shrinking at the same time, some were feeling the effects faster than others as Rouge was starting to get a tingly feeling flowing through her.

Rouge:..I feel funny...

Knuckles: What's wrong Wouge?

Rouge: I feel like...I'm shrinky faster...

The others were taking notice of Rouge's shrinking as she was shrinking faster than the others and the fluid from her umbilical cord was flowing faster than normal.

Sonic: I think you're goin nini Wouge.

Rouge: Nini...?

Now because of the mind fluid from earlier, Sonic and others were reprogramed to accept whatever the Womb o' Sphere did to them as a good thing. Rouge squirmed with happiness.

Rouge: Oh yeah! Nini! Mommy must want me to go nini!

Cream: Mommy must want all of us to go nini!

Silver: Of course! Mommy always wants what's best for us!

As the mobians cheered and squirm with glee, Rouge's regression was accelerating rapidly. Her wings were shrinking until they were nothing but tiny stubs, her fingers and toes became webbed and stubby, and she was slowly losing her ability to think. Rouge felt that her time had come as she waved goodbye to her friends.

Rouge: Wouge go nini...

The others waved back at Rouge as she shrank faster and faster. Rouge stopped waving as she regressed past her fetal stage and into her embryo stage. Her body continued to shrink more and until finally, Poof! Rouge disappeared, regressed and gone forever. But she wasn't going to be the only one for long, as Knuckles was getting the same tingly feeling Rouge felt. Knuckles giggled and squirmed with glee.

Knuckles: My turn to go nini now.

Knuckles waved goodbye to the others as he rapidly shrunk faster and faster. Quickly regressing past his fetal stage into his embryo stage in a matter of seconds. He continued to shrink and shrink until, Poof, Knuckles was gone forever too...at this point the remaining six mobians have all shrunk down to their fetal stages. Sonic, Amy, Tails, Cream, Silver and Blaze all continued to float peacefully in the womb o' sphere as their time grew shorter and shorter. Their toes and fingers were all webbed and stubby at this point and their skin was now almost see through. Even through all this regression, they still felt happy. As another minute passed, Both Silver and Blaze were both beginning to feel that tingly feeling.

Silver: I think I'm goin nini too.

Blaze: Me too! Blazie go nini...

Silver and Blaze giggled and waved goodbye as they both shrank into their embryo stage. Faster and faster they continued to shrink and until they disappeared, First when Silver and Blaze went shortly after. Now only four remained as the regression fluid continued to flow through the mobians bodies. The remaining four were losing more of their features. Sonic's back quills receded into his back, Amy lost her bangs and her tail was gone, Tails' bangs were now gone and both his tails were just tiny stubs and Cream's ears were super short and her tail was completely gone. But features weren't the only things disapearing as Tails and Cream now felt the tingly sensation.

Tails: Tailsy go nini...

Cream: Cweam go nini toos...

Tails and Cream were already at their embryo stage as they waved goodbye to Sonic and Amy. It took merely 10 seconds as Tails and Cream both disappeared at the same time, gone forever just like the rest. Now only Sonic and Amy remained, They were already were feeling they tingly sensation the moment Tails and Cream disappeared. Sonic and Amy looked at each other for the last time. Sonic giggled.

Sonic: I guess it's nini time for us.

Amy cooed in agreement.

Amy: Mhmm, just like Mommy wanted us to...

Sonic and Amy waved goodbye as they weakly said their final words.

Sonic and Amy: Nini...Mom...my...

It was all they could mutter as they both regressed and disappeared with a poof. That was it. The mobians were now all gone forever. Regressed past the point conception. Sonic, Amy, Tails, Cream, Silver, Blaze, Knuckles and Rouge were all now nothing but a memory now. With no one inside, the Womb o' Sphere shut itself down and deactivated all functions. However, the rest of the Baby Factory continued it's very busy work in other parts of the factory. For you see Before being put inside the Womb o' Sphere, DNA samples were extracted from Sonic and the others before being put inside. The factory saved these samples so they could clone them and forever have bundles of joy to deliver to families without babies of their own. Even now, deep in the heart of the factory, Babified clones of Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Cream, Silver, Blaze and Rouge were peacefully floating inside containment tubes, each with diapers wrapped around their waists, and it wasn't just one set of clones either as thousands of clones were sleeping in tubes, ready to be born.

Bad End.
132132.title: Bad Ending: From Womb to Poof

choices: The Voice speaks to each of them individually, Winning them over.
They resist and try to Escape
1322.content:
Sonic slowly began waking up. His vision was slowly returning to him as he was trying to remember what happened. Last thing he remembered was wondering into this strange factory with his friends, only to be sprayed with this weird mist. Sonic tried to sit up but he felt something tug him back down. He was in shock to find that his stomach was strapped down in the laying position on what appeared to be an oversized changing table for babies. He also noticed that his Gloves and Shoes were missing too, all he was wearing was a thick, poofy diaper. The Diaper had super babyish designs and it crinkled with almost every movement he made. Sonic tried to get up again but with no luck, his legs felt like jelly and could barely move them. He was beginning to feel like an helpless infant. Sonic laid his head back down on his pillow as he tried to think of a way out of here. Suddenly he heard a voice calling out to him from the right side of him.

???: Sonic? Are you awake?

Sonic turned next to him to see Amy laying on a similar looking changing table. Amy was also dressed like he was, with nothing but a big poofy diaper with similar patterns has his.

Sonic: Amy? What happened? How did we get here?

Amy: I don't know. One minute we were in the factory and the next thing we knew, we all woke up here.

Sonic: We? The others are here too?

Tails: We're here Sonic.

Sonic turned to his left side to see Tails on a changing table, in the same position as he and Amy. Sonic then lifted his upper body up again to see Cream, Knuckles, Rouge, Silver and Blaze all around him. Their changing tables were arranged in a big circle. Everyone was wearing the same looking diapers too. He could barely see their faces past the big poofy diapers they were wearing but he could still tell it was his friends.

Rouge: We've all been here for a while now, you just took your sweet time waking up.

Sonic: Where are we anyway? Is there any way out of here?

Rouge: Where we are I do not know. There's no way out of here either...though some of us refuse to give up...

Rouge turned next to her where Knuckles was still fighting his strap furiously. Rouge shook her head.

Rouge: You know all you're going to do is burn yourself out right?

Knuckles: I Don't Care!!! I am not going to sit around here and be humiliated like this.

Cream looked at her diaper and wiggled her legs a tiny bit.

Cream: I don't think it's so bad, at least it's comfy.

Amy chuckled a bit.

Amy: At least you're looking at the bright side Cream.

Blaze started to blush and cross her arms.

Blaze: This is so embarrassing....I wish they'd give me a shirt at least...Bad enough my flames aren't working either.

Sonic: Your Powers don't work Blaze?

Tails: All of us can't use our powers. Silver can't concentrate on his Psychokinesis, Rouge, Cream and I can't fly, Knuckles lost all his strength...

Amy: And I can't summon my hammer.

Sonic looked down at his feet and moved his legs a little.

Sonic: and Guessing since my legs feel like jelly, I can't run either.

Silver: All of our legs feel numb. It's like someone or something doesn't want us to go anywhere.

Suddenly, there was a humming sound coming from the room. Machine parts were beginning to move and something was being activated. Sonic and friends began to panic, worried about what was going to happen to them. A hole slowly started to open up in the ceiling. Once the hole was fully open, a Giant Mobile began to lower itself down. It was colored in Baby Blue and Baby Pink, with Plush Chao and Butterflies hanging from it. Sonic and the others looked up at the Mobile in confusion.

Knuckles: What is that?

Rouge: It's a Mobile Dummy...

Knuckles: I KNOW WHAT IT IS!

Silver: Why is it here though?

Suddenly the mobile began to slowly turn. As it turned, the tune of rock-a-bye baby began to play. The mobile played it's first loop of the song then immediately played it again. Sonic and the others were cautiously looking at it as the music played, expecting something to happen...But nothing happened.

Sonic: Ok...This is annoying.

Blaze: Very.

Tails: Guys something doesn't feel right...

Cream suddenly gasped.

Cream: LOOK OUT!!!

Everyone quickly looked up to see a swarm of Mechanical hands swiftly come down with pairs of colorful headphones. The hands were trying to attach them onto their heads. Sonic and the others tried to fight back, but given their weaken state, they didn't stand much of a chance. Once the headphones were safely secure onto each of their heads, the mechanical hands quickly returned to which they came from. Sonic and the others all tried to remove the headphones, but it was no use. They felt like they were fused to their heads. Even with the headphones attached to them, they could still hear the mobile's lullaby almost clearly. They didn't give up the struggle as they continued to pull the headphones off of their heads. Suddenly, a motherly voice began to play through each of their headphones.

Voice: Now Now, No more fussing. You're safe now.

Sonic and the others' resistance struggles began to slow down a little as the voice talked to them.

Voice: There There, See? No need for any worries. Mommy's right here.

Sonic and the others stopped fighting the headphones and calmly laid back down onto their changing tables.

Voice: Good Babies. See? There's nothing to worry about. Mommy's here to protect and take care of you. Mommy loves you, yes she does. You're Mommy's happy little babies. Can you say that?

Sonic and the others all began to speak in unison in a monotone like voice.

All: We're Mommy's Happy Little Babies...

Voice: Good Babies. Mommy loves you so much.

Sonic and the others felt calm and relaxed. The Motherly voice mixed with the lullaby was taking affect on them. One by One they were falling under it's spell.

Sonic: This feels...so nice...But how can it?

Tails: I feel so...Happy...But...

Amy: This isn't right...is it? No...Mommy says so, so it must be.

Cream: I love it here...But..I'm big right?

Blaze: I Need to...Resist...But...it feels so....wonderful

Silver: Mommy...Knows what's...best....does she?

Knuckles: I'm a happy....B-Baby...N-No...

Rouge: M-M....Mama...Not My...Mama...

Sonic and the others were still fighting it off, but they were quickly losing the battle. If they continue like this, they'll be at the mercy of the Nursery, and their new "Mommy"
1322.title: Mommy's New Babies

13221.content:
"Sonic isn't it silly that you've wasted so much time trying to foil the plans of a soon to be elderly man time and time again when you could explore all of the world's wonders?" The Hedgehog laughed to himself upon hearing that.

"Tails don't you think following the path others took all of your life is wasteful?" Tails pondered that message as he knew he followed in Sonic's footsteps a lot but was he really lacking in going his own direction in life?

"Knuckles don't you wish to life the burden of caring for the Master Emerald for all of your life?" The echidna nodded as he always wished for something really to do besides the lonely job of Master Emerald guardian.

"Amy don't you wish you spent less time running after someone who didn't feel the same way you do?" Amy was nearly in tears as she truly wished she had found love instead of spending it all chasing Sonic.

"Cream don't you wish to be more free from the authority that is the adults?" The voice was making Cream develop a little rebel side as a smirk grew on her face...now she certainly did.

"Rouge don't you want something more to your life than stealing jewelry from others?" At one point Rouge did think she could have that with either Shadow or Knuckles but that time had past and it seemed Mommy had the solution she sought.

"Blaze don't you want to be free of the burden of protecting the Sol Emeralds?" Blaze was in a similar boat as Knuckles in which she wanted to spend her life exploring her world with Marine but the emeralds were in the way of that...until now.

"Silver don't you want to stop having to worry about a future that cannot be saved?" The hedgehog never gave up on trying to change his present but each time he did something new would be the cause of it or he'd somehow make things worse and when it came to it giving up would be a relief for him.

"Mommy can fix all of your problems by giving you a fresh start." The eight heroes applauded as the machines came back in and took each Mobian into a different room in order to get the process started...
13221.title: The Voice speaks to each of them individually, ...

132212.content:
The Machines took each of the heroes into their own private nursery so they could get the proper treatment they desired from Mommy. Each Nursery was almost empty, the only things inside were some babyish designs on the walls and a crib, big enough to hold each of them. In their own separate rooms, the machine gently laid each mobian down in their new cribs,just like a mother would with their infant. Once inside their cribs, the mechanical hands returned back into the ceiling and their "Mommy's" voice began to play again.

Mommy: Soon you'll all be happy and safe under Mommy's care. Get comfy and listen to everything Mommy says ok?

Sonic and his friends were getting very excited thanks to their "Mommy's" Suggestions. Sonic was wiggling his legs as his diaper crinkled, Tails was playing with his toes, Knuckles was sucking his thumb, Amy was fluffing her pillow making sure she was comfy while listening to Mommy, Cream also wiggled her legs but was also giggly about her new life with mommy, Blaze was being quiet and good so she can listen, Silver was super giggly, and Rouge had her thumb in her mouth as she was lifting one of her legs in the air with her other arm like a tiny baby would. Now the computer, aka "Mommy", already had new personality programs for each of them in mind, however they couldn't be installed into the mobians without first making changes to all of them at the same time first. Mommy calculated all the programs she needed to run and proceed to begin the process.

What happens first?
132212.title: Mental changes were in mind

1322121.content: What was the first step "Mommy" took
1322121.title: Memory Erasing and Unpotty training

choices: Up to Babyhood, Sonic and Friends act like Infants
Total Complete Memory Wipe, Sonic and Friends become Blank Slates
13221211.content: Mommy decided that the first step was to wipe out their memories of adulthood. How far will the memory erasing go?
13221211.title: Memory Erasing

choices: Instantly, Time to reprogram the Babies
8 hours, follow the process along and have some fun
132212112.content:
"Mommy" decided that it was for the best for the Mobians to receive a complete memory wipe. This program is extremely powerful. Once activated any and all memories lost will never, ever be recovered again. They will forget everything about their old lives, the adventures they've had, the people they've met, even their own friendships with themselves. They'll forget how to walk, how to talk, how to use the potty, and even their own names, all unless the computer decides to give any of these things back on it's own. "Mommy" loaded up the program and began the procedure. It started with putting Sonic and the others to sleep. Soft, yet powerful lullabies played through their headphones. They were becoming super drowsy, falling under the Music's sweet sweet spell. As the Music played, "Mommy's" voice played through the headphones.

Mommy: It's time to go nini. There There, You are safe now. Sleep...Mommy will make everything better...You will be happy. You will be loved. You will forever be under Mommy's care...Now, Say Nini...

Sonic and his friends responded one by one in a monotone tone.

Sonic: Sonic go Nini...

Tails: Tails go Nini...

Amy: Amy go Nini...

Cream: Cream go Nini...

Knuckles: Knuckles go Nini...

Rouge: Rouge go Nini...

Blaze: Blaze go Nini...

Silver: Silver go Nini...

After they responded to "Mommy's" commands, They peacefully drifted off to sleep. Not to wake again until the Memory wipe and Reprogramming were complete. "Mommy" Began to run the program immediately. The Computer sent the memory wipe signals into the headphones while the lullabies played. Their old lives and their memories were about to be gone forever. How long did the Memory wipe process take?
132212112.title: Completely Blank Slates

13221212.content:
"Mommy" knew exactly where to start. The computer began to run the program and executed it through the Mobians' headphones using "Mommy's" voice.

Mommy: First thing's first, one thing Good Babies always do is use their diapers. All Babies must use their diapers.

Sonic and the others responded in a monotone voice.

All: All Good Babies use their diapers...

Mommy responded happily.

Mommy: Yes, Very good. All good babies make PeePee and PooPoo in their diapers, they don't use the potty. That's what makes Mommy happy. Sadly, you all know how to use the potty, which makes using your diapers almost impossible.

The Mobians began to whine. They wanted to use their diapers, they all wanted to make Mommy happy.

Mommy: There There, Mommy Fix. Mommy will get rid of that mean old potty training.

The Computer began running the Potty Training Erasing program through the headphones. Disguising the program through babyish music, Sonic and the others were happily listening, Giggling and Squirming as their potty training experience was getting wiped from their mind. Within a matter of minutes, The Mobians have forgotten how to control their bladders and bowels. With no way of getting it back, They were now 100% reliant on their diapers. Even if they were to escape and resist, they'd have to wear diapers for the rest of their life. "Mommy" happily replied through the headphones.

Mommy: There we go, All gone. You're now fully diaper trained.

The Mobians happily cheered from each of their individual rooms.

Sonic: Thank you Mommy. We feel so much better.

Tails: We're finally free from the potty.

Amy: We love our diapers.

"Mommy" Happily replied to the cheers and praise.

Mommy: I'm so glad, now let's show how much you all love your diapers. Get ready to go potty.

The headphones began to send signals to the Mobians' brains. These signals were telling Sonic and the others to go potty right now. 13232.content:
The Mechanical hands took the unconscious mobians deep within the factory. Inside the depths of the factory was some sort of lab with all sorts of machines and computers, and in the center of it all was a room with 8 tables attached what looked to be machines. The Machines were kinda brick like with monitors in the center of them. Over seeing the room with the tables was a Massive Master Computer which looked to be uploading data on the group. The Hands gently placed each of them mobians onto the tables with Sonic, Amy, Blaze and Knuckles on one side and Tails, Cream, Silver and Rouge on the other. Once placed down, the hands then proceeded to undress each of them until they were completely naked. As the hands lifted away with their clothes, another set of hands proceeded to position them properly on the tables and strapped them in by the waist. Once Strapped, the first set of hands came back carrying diapers and baby powder. Both sets of hands changed the mobians into the diapers, taking proper care like they were handing infants and all through the process, Sonic and his friends were still fast asleep. After being properly powdered and diapered up, The hands all retreated back to the ceiling leaving the rest of the process up to the master computer. The Master Computer finished it's uploading and began to speak through the speakers.

" Data Upload Complete! Subjects Now registered to factory database as Test Subjects. Beginning Project Reborn"

Project Reborn was an experimental project created before the factory shut down. It was to give Mobians a second chance in life and start over anew but at the cost of memories of their past life. It was abandoned after a malfunction which caused those hooked up to regress past the point of birth and disappear from existence. This malfunction caused the factory to shut down forever because of how dangerous it was. However the Master Computer had been left on all these years, calculating the mistake and how to fix it. Will it work properly this time? Our heroes were about to find out.

"Registered Subjects: Sonic the Hedgehog Age 15, Amy Rose Age 12, Miles Tails Prower Age 8, Cream the Rabbit Age 6, Knuckles the Echidna Age 16, Rouge the Bat Age 18, Blaze the Cat Age 15, Silver the Hedgehog Age 14. All Subjects and Ages Registered. Beginning Set Up Now"

Suddenly a bunch of tubes and wires popped out of the machines attached to Sonic and the others's tables. The wires hooked up onto their heads through suction cups. These wires were to be used during the memory wipe portion. Next the tubes, which had needles at the tips of them, injected themselves into each of the mobians arms and legs. These tubes were for used for the regression formula to flow through their bodies. All through the process, the mobians were still in their peaceful slumber, unaffected and unaware of what's happening around them. Once everything was attached, the monitors on their machines began to turn on. The Monitors displayed the status of their bodies, including mini images of their bodies as well as heartrate, age, and at the bottom were 2 empty bars that were labeled "Mind Wipe" and "Regression", these were to monitor the progress of the Process. Once everything was set, the Master Computer spoke again.

"Calculating...Calculating...Calculation Complete! Best Dosage for simultaneous completion found! Time to Project Reborn Completion: Aprox. 12 hours. Beginning Project Reborn!"

This was it. Sonic, Tails, Amy, Cream, Knuckles, Rouge, Silver and Blaze were now at the mercy of the Project Reborn. Will it all proceed as planned? or will it all fail....only time will tell.

What happened first during the process?

But then a sudden bright flash of light came out of nowhere and blinded the group temporarily. When the light faded and their vision returned they came to a sudden realization, All their clothes were missing. Gone in a flash just like that light. Everyone started to panic again.

Amy: WHAT HAPPENED TO MY CLOTHES?!
