It was a funny looking helmet, it had several lights and cords that lead all the way up to the ceiling. Before the others could react, the same kind of helmets landed and locked on to their heads too.

Knuckles: What the heck are these things?!

Rouge: I-I can't take it off!!!

The helmets then began to light up and a stream of energy started to surge from the cords. They felt their heads feeling lighter and lighter, thoughts were leaving their minds, memories were being erased. These helmets were reprogramming our heroes minds and it was working. The group struggled as much as they could but it was no use, they were fighting a losing battle.

Tails: I...can't...think...straight...

Amy: S-Sonic...H-Help...

Sonic: W-What's...Happening...to...

The group slowly stopped their struggles. As the helmets continued their jobs, the group just stood there with blank stares and happy smiles. Their feelings of fear began to turn into feelings of joy and happiness, it's as if they were beginning to like their new reprogramming. Their minds began to fade more and more but that didn't bother them anymore. All they did was giggle about their current situation. After a few minutes, the lights on their helmets began to fade and the energy going through the cords began to stop. Their reprogramming was finally finished. The helmets then unlocked themselves from Sonic and Co and lifted up back into the ceiling from which they dropped. The group just continued to stand there. Their eyelids heavy, big smiles on their faces, and drool slowly dripping from their mouths. They were in total bliss about their new state of mind...
15133.title: A New "State of Mind"

choices: A Chute, Leading to their new nursery home
Another Set of Hands, Come to lift them away
151331.content:
Just then a light began to shine from above. The light was shining on a conveyor belt just a few feet away from Sonic and Friends. The group looked at the conveyor belt the light was shining on and slowly began to walk towards it. Once reaching the Belt, One by one the group willfully climbed on it. First Sonic, then Tails, Amy, Cream, Silver, Blaze, Rouge, then Finally Knuckles. As they each climbed on they slowly laid on their backs being as good and obedient as they could be. The belt carried them through the main lobby of the factory until they reached a doorway. As they approached the door automatically opened and one by one the conveyor belt lead them through. Beyond the door was a Gigantic bright and colorful room filled with more machines and mechanical hands everywhere. The walls of the room were decorated with babyish designs and pictures, the area with filled with baby mobile music, giving the room the feel of a giant nursery. It was clear that Sonic and Friends were going to be processed as Babies. As the group entered, they were immediately noticed by the mechanical hands. The hands lowered themselves down to them and began to examine them. Tickling them, checking and softly lifting their arms and legs, the hands were giving them a full examination. The group just giggled as the hands continued their job, not putting up any form of fight.

The hands suddenly lifted themselves back up and the group suddenly found themselves heading for some sort of gigantic station. the station seemed to resemble a giant changing table, big enough for all 8 of them even in their single file line. Once they reached it the belt made a gentle and slow stop, making sure not to harm anyone on board. Once they stopped the baby music started to play a little louder as the hands lowered themselves down again to do their job. The hands were hold what looked to be powder puffs covered with Baby Powder. The hands lowered themselves to sonic and co, each one got two sets of hands above them. One hand gently held onto their legs while the other gently dabbed the powder puff onto their lower regions. Once done the hands lifted themselves back up again and another set of hands lowered down. This time one of the hands from each set was holding a diaper. Each hand was holding a different kind of diaper though, a Blue and white diaper with Mickey Mouse patterns on it for the Boys and a Pink and white diaper with Minnie Mouse patterns on it for the Girls. The hands gently lifted each "baby" up by their legs and slid the diapers underneath them. Once the diaper was underneath, they were gently lowered back down onto it. The hands then lifted up the front of their diapers and slowly placed it on their waists, then they proceeded to tape the diapers around their waists. This caused the group to giggle even louder, their reprogramming made them really happy to be put back into diapers.

Once the diapers were properly applied, the hands lifted back up and there was pause before the next phase. This pause gave The "Babies" a chance to enjoy their new diapers. They all kicked their feet up into the air as their giggles and the soft crinkle sounds of their diapers filled the room. They were in pure and total bliss. After a few minutes, the belt began to move again, carrying the freshly diapered group to the next station. This station had shelves filled with baby bottles. The Bottles were filled with what looked to be formula, but something was a little different about it. Once the belt stopped at the station, the hands lowered themselves down again. One hand gently lifted each baby up by the back and the other proceeded to feed them the bottles filled with formula. Sonic and co happily began to drink for the bottles. As they drank the smiles on their faces began to grow even more. They each drank as different speeds, Sonic Knuckles and Amy were the fastest to finish their bottles, Silver and Rouge drank at normal speed, while Tails, Cream, and Blaze were the slowest to finish theirs. After they were properly fed, they were gently lifted back down in the laying position and the conveyor belt continued onto the next station. The "babies" now with happy faces and full tummies were in total bliss. But the formula they drank was no ordinary formula, Cause shortly after they drank it, their tummies began to gurggle. What could it mean? They were soon to find out as they pulled up to the next station.

This station was very different from the other two stations. All that was there was a lone motherly looking robot and nothing else. The Conveyor belt stopped with Sonic stopping right at the robot. It would seem that they would have to go one at a time unlike the other stations. The Robot's eyes began to lift up. It proceeded to gently pick Sonic up and gently place him over it's shoulders. The Robot then gave Sonic three gentle pats on the back. Now normally this would cause him to burp, however thanks to the formula given to them, the pats would cause a different effect on the "babies". Sonic began to make soft grunts as the back end of his diaper slowly began to fill up. The formula was causing the "babies" to poop themselves once they were given those three soft pats. After his diaper was filled, Sonic let out a soft sigh and he was then gently place back on the belt, with the robot making sure that his diaper wouldn't be smooshed in the process. The Belt then began to move forward again then suddenly stopped. It was now Tails's turn. The Robot gave him the three soft pats on the back then Tails began to fill his diaper. Then Amy was given three pats on the back and she then proceeded to fill her diaper too. Cream was given her three pats and filled her diaper. Silver was given his three pats and filled his diaper. Blaze was given her three pats and filled her diaper. Rouge was given her three pats and filled her diaper. Then Finally Knuckles was given his three pats and filled his diaper. The "babies" all sighed in relief after properly filling their diapers. After they were all done, the conveyor belt began to move towards it's final station. As they moved along the "babies" began to kick their legs again as they giggled and cooed through the last length of the factory. There was no sign of a changing station in sight but the "babies" didn't seem to care. They seem to like using their diapers.

The end of the conveyor belt seemed to be in sight as their final destination moved closer and closer. Once they reached the end, they were greeted by...
151331.title: Processing

15223221.content:
Cream was pulled through the depths of the mechanism, screaming and kicking the entire way. Blinded by the complete darkness she was surrounded in, she couldn't figure out how to escape her binds, or even see how she was bound. Though she felt herself begin to slow down, then come to a complete stop. She didn't know why this was, but she wondered what it meant.

In fact, the reason why the machine had stopped was because while calculating what dimension to send Cream to, it came to the conclusion that this was already the dimension in which Cream would fit into. The machine was using most of it's computing power to figure out what to do in this scenario. Due to how the machine was built it began to fall onto a subroutine that simply caused it to pair up using the most similar subject. So Cream once again found herself hurtling through the mechanism until she was blinded by a bright light and then lost consciousness.

One of the tunnel ends manages to get through to her.
1522322221.content:
Blaze was pulled through the depths of the mechanism, screaming and kicking the entire way. Blinded by the complete darkness she was surrounded in, but luckily for her, she could create fire, lighting up her hands she saw she was bound entirely by some strange mechanical arms, leading her past a series of different looking tunnels. Suddenly she was pulled into one of them and was now heading towards a bright white light.

"Oh no!" she screamed as she lit her entire body up, causing the metal bonds around her to break due the their own pressure combined with her heat.

Blaze didn't miss a beat as she began crawling her way back through the tunnel, it was fairly narrow so she couldn't move very quickly. Though with her heat she could easily keep the metal bonds at bay. She was heading back up the tunnel when suddenly all of the tunnels to the sides lit up, the lights began getting closer as Blaze realized if the machine couldn't bring her to the ends of the tunnels, it would simply more the tunnel ends to her.

Blaze began melting the metal of the tunnels adjacent to her, to stop the lights from getting to her, she could feel she was almost back to where she had been kidnapped from.
1522322221.title: Blaze

15223222211.content: Blaze manages to exit the tunnel and fall down into a room, escaping her predicament. Standing up she began to look around, she was in a room with several giant computers, monitors all around, and each monitor had one of her friends on it! As Blaze looked around at the monitors she noticed all her friends in the video footage seemed to be dressed like babies, wearing childish clothes and diapers. Blaze wondered if from this room, she could somehow help them?

choices: Pee the diaper, it's not like you can go anywhere else
Try and hold it a bit longer
15223222221.content:
Rouge was pulled through the depths of the mechanism, screaming and kicking the entire way. Blinded by the complete darkness she was surrounded in, she couldn't figure out how to escape her binds, or even see how she was bound. It didn't matter though, as suddenly a blinding light flashed right in front of her as she faded out of consciousness.

Suddenly Rouge began to wake up. Her eyes fluttering open as she observed several things at once. Firstly, she was in some type of room, light was pouring in from a nearby window, there were bars around her and her legs felt like they were being forced apart. She sat up and heard a crinkling sound as well as getting a good feel of something rather soft around her waist. Looking around she saw she was in a bed of some kind, bars all around her, reaching high above her. She stood up, uneven on her feet due to her legs being spread, she grabbed onto the wooden bars and soon realized she was in a crib!

"What is going on?" she said aloud to herself.

Rouge took stock of herself, looking down she was wearing a sort of night shirt, it was black and went down past her knees, lifting the shirt revealed that between her legs was a diaper! It was plain white with little blue and purple gems dotting it.

'Alright, I'm in a crib, in a diaper, and in a strange place. Am I still in that factory?' Rouge thought to herself as she began to flap her wings.

Though instead of simply lifting up off of the bed, she found she could barely attain flight. She struggled as she made her wings flap faster, managing a slight hover before the fatigue wore her down and she landed on the bed, her diaper making a racket of crinkles as it happened. Looking at herself Rouge noticed she wasn't exactly the same, she looked much the same but seemed a bit chubbier, not an unhealthy amount, but definitely more pudge around her arms, legs and belly than before.

Unfortunately as Rouge began to try to think of a way out, she suddenly felt a shiver run down her spine as the need to urinate became immediately apparent, trying to close her legs to help didn't work, not with this diaper, what was she going to do?
15223222221.title: Rouge

152232222212.content:
Rouge wasn't going to just wet herself like some sort of baby! She needed to get out of here. She tried shaking the bars of the crib, trying to see if she could lower it in some way. Trying to fly had already failed her once before, she couldn't see any way out of this scenario, that is until the door to the room opened.

In walked a bat, a large bat, larger than Rouge herself. This bat woman looked somewhat like herself, though she was brown instead of white. The brown bat was wearing a yellow shirt and what Rouge could most adeptly describe as mom pants.

"Looks like my little girl is awake huh?" the brown bat said as she went over to the crib.

"Who are you?" Rouge questioned.

"Silly, it's me, your mommy." her 'mom' said as she went over to the crib.

The brown bat lowered the crib's bars from the outside and then grabbed up Rouge with hardly any effort, and at the same time the woman pressed a hand into the front of Rouge's diaper, causing Rouge to blush.

"Oh my, your nice and dry this morning, I bet you need to pee bad huh?" the brown bat asked rhetorically as she carried Rouge off to the bathroom.

Of course Rouge was wondering a lot of things right now, but the main thing was the bathroom, her 'mom' was apparently taking Rouge to the toilet, if she could just hold herself a few moments more, she could avoid peeing in her diaper.
152232222212.title: Try and hold it a bit longer

1522322222121.content:
Through sheer strength of will, Rouge managed to keep her bladder from releasing into the waiting diaper as her 'mom' carried her into the bathroom. The bathroom it's self was rather large, there was a large vanity sink, a huge tub, and a huge toilet, all of which looked to fit the size of this other bat. Though as they came in, the brown bat pulled a large pink training potty out from behind a hamper. Immediately Rouge began to freak out.

"No way, I'm not using that!" Rouge screamed.

"Well little miss, either you use your training potty or you tinkle in your diaper." her 'mom' said as she placed Rouge onto the floor.

Rouge now had a decision to make, did she humiliate herself and use the training potty, or did she pee in the diaper? Of course it only took her a few seconds to realize what the better option was.

"Fine!" Rouge shouted as she tugged at the diaper's tapes.

Her 'mom' simply pulled the diaper tapes off and then grabbed Rouge and set her onto the potty. Rouge immediately let herself go, sighing contently as a loud spattering sound filled the air. Rouge would deal with using this small potty in favor of having to get a diaper change. It only took a few more seconds for Rouge to finish, then she stepped off of the potty.

Her mother quickly cleaned Rouge up, which caused extreme blushing for the poor girl. She tried to avoid looking as her 'mom' then picked up the training potty and emptied it's contents into the toilet, flushing it.

Now that her bladder wasn't aching for relief Rouge could think a bit more clearly about what she was going to do. She had to find a way out of this place, but how, she had no idea how she got here. But before she could continue this line of thought she was picked up and something was slid up her legs, a pull-up with little gold rings all over it.

"Alright sweetie, let's go.."
1522322222121.title: Rouge manages to hold it

choices: Well, it looks like someone gets a treat.
Well you sure were hungry huh, how about some more?
15223222221211.content:
"Get you some breakfast." she said as she began carting Rouge off.

Her alleged mother took her from the bathroom, through the hall and into a large kitchen. Rouge looked to the table to see a highchair, oh no, she was not going to sit in that thing. She began squirming, but unfortunately the larger bat was just too strong for her, and she was sat down in the high chair and strapped in. She couldn't reach the straps because they were under the stupid tray table. Either way her mother began rummaging through the cupboards and began pulling out some cereal.

Rouge watched as a bowl of rather plain looking cereal was made and then brought to her tray.

"Here you go sweetie, you feed yourself while mommy takes care of some things." the older bat said as she then wandered off.

Rouge contemplated not eating, but her stomach was telling her she was hungry, so she took the small spoon and put the first bit of cereal and milk into her mouth, it tasted... Bland. Like, plain oat cereal in milk. What was the point of being a kid if she didn't get to eat the exciting kid food? Whatever, food was food, and she was going to need her strength in order to escape whatever this was. So she went ahead and finished her cereal. Just then the other bat came back, noticing Rouge finished all her cereal, she said.
15223222221211.title: Get you some breakfast

152232222212112.content:
"How about some more?" the older bat said as she took the bowl and refilled it.

She brought it back to Rouge and then left to go do more of whatever she had been doing. Rouge ate this next bowl as she thought about how she was going to get out of here. She was small, so she'd need a way to access a door or a window, and her wings weren't going to be much help. She'd have to either wait until she got outside this house, or for some other opportunity, until then she had to play the part she was given, though she wouldn't like it.

Just as she finished this new bowl of cereal the older bat came back and unstrapped her from the high chair.

"Alright honey, lets.."

info.brief_description: Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Cream, Rouge, Silver, and Blaze are in a baby factory
info.description:
All Right! My First Story!

Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Cream, Silver, Blaze, and Rouge are in the baby factory from Baby Bottleneck (Porky and Daffy are NOT in it!)
The Machines mistake the Group of 8 as Babies...Will they regress? Will they go through conveyor belt and get delivered to a expecting family, or will they be trapped and babied? You Decide!!!


Updated Rules:

1.Keep it PG-13, no sex and gore
2.any form of regression is acceptable
3.Only deaths that are acceptable are regression related ones (Example: Regressing beyond embryo)
4.Messing is allowed, but nothing too extreme
5.Othe Sonic characters like, Sally acorn, Shadow, etc. can join in the story but, make sure the main characters get spotlight too. (Please no fan characters, and No Eggman)
6.have fun.
info.pretty_title: Sonic and Friends in the Baby Factory
